info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 3:26PM CDT until May 13 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MACOUPIN COUNTY... At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilsonville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter sized hail in Shipman. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Staunton, Gillespie, Mount Olive, Bunker Hill, Benld, Shipman, Wilsonville, Sawyerville, Mount Clare, East Gillespie, Eagarville, White City, Royal Lakes, Dorchester, Pruett, and Plainview. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 41 and 44. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
